name: Astrocharge
description:
• This is a click and shoot game
  • You can charge up shots which takes more time but you will go faster and move more powerfully
  • Survive for the longest time and beat high scores
  • The game will get harder and harder as time progresses.
  • If anyone gets past 100 seconds there legally insane
  • Explore the neon map and collect coins to gain extra lives
  • All music, game play, and SFX where created by me(FreezeDev)

COMMENT WITH A PICTURE OF YOUR HIGH SCORE TO GET YOUR NAME PUT INTO THE GAME PAGE!! 

THIS WEEK WINNERS(winners announced on Fridays)
